title: The Gates, Project for Central Park, New York City [top panel]
medium: top panel of two parts: collage with photograph by Wolfgang Volz, aerial photograph, wax crayon, graphite, and tape on wove paper
dimensions:
Overall: 37.8 x 165 cm (14 7/8 x 64 15/16 in.)
overall size (for both panels): 144.6 x 165 cm (56 15/16 x 64 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of a Private Collector in honor of Dorothy and Herbert Vogel
